plot: Battleground: Alexander the Great follows the battlefield strategy of one of history's fiercest warriors. The battle at Galgamela is re-enacted through live action & CGI.
plot_en: Battleground: Alexander the Great follows the battlefield strategy of one of history's fiercest warriors. The battle at Galgamela is re-enacted through live action & CGI.
plot_es: Battleground: Alexander the Great follows the battlefield strategy of one of history's fiercest warriors. The battle at Galgamela is re-enacted through live action & CGI.
title: Battleground: The Art of War
